properties.value: Red topaz is a type of semi-precious gem. Red topaz can be cut from uncut red topaz with level 16 Crafting by using a chisel, granting 25 experience. While cutting red topaz, the player may accidentally crush an uncut red topaz into a crushed gem and will receive only 6.3 Crafting experience. When used with a furnace and jewellery mould, they can be used to make red topaz jewellery.

Item ID1613

Red topaz is a type of semi-precious gem. Red topaz can be cut from uncut red topaz with level 16 Crafting by using a chisel, granting 25 experience. While cutting red topaz, the player may accidentally crush an uncut red topaz into a crushed gem and will receive only 6.3 Crafting experience. When used with a furnace and jewellery mould, they can be used to make red topaz jewellery.

Cutting chance[edit | edit source]

The chance to successfully cut a red topaz is: ( level − 1 ) ∗ 150 / 98 + 91 256 {\displaystyle {\frac {({\text{level}}-1)*150/98+91}{256}}} [1]

As such, it is impossible to have a 100% success rate as that would require level 109.

Based on this probability formula, the price of uncut red topaz 2,013, and the price of red topaz 2,498, the minimum crafting level to breakeven or better when flipping red topaz is 77.

Training[edit | edit source]

Crafting[edit | edit source]

Red topaz can be crafted into jewellery at a furnace by using a silver bar and the appropriate crafting mould.

Level Input Material Cost[c 1] Output Sell Price Profit / loss XP/Craft XP/Hour Coins/XP
16 Red topaz Silver bar 2,588 Topaz ring 1,781 −807 35 22,750 −23.06
32 Red topaz Silver bar 2,588 Topaz necklace 1,310 −1,278 70 45,500 −18.26
38 Red topaz Silver bar 2,588 Topaz bracelet 2,533 −55 75 48,750 −0.73
45 Red topaz Silver bar 2,588 Topaz amulet (u) 2,194 −394 80 52,000 −4.92
45 Topaz amulet (u) Ball of wool 2,229 Topaz amulet 2,567 338 4 8,000 84.5
48 Red topaz 2,498 Topaz bolt tips x12 2,340 −158 4 11,600 −39.5
  1. ↑ Cost calculated assuming all inputs are purchased from the Grand exchange.

Magic[edit | edit source]

Red topaz jewellery can be enchanted using Lvl-3 Enchant, requiring level 49 Magic. The spell requires 1 Cosmic rune, 5 Fire runes, and the piece of Red topaz Jewellery that is to be enchanted.

Unenchanted Cost of Unenchanted Jewellery Material Cost[m 1] Enchanted Sell price Profit/Loss XP/Cast XP/Hour Coins/XP
Topaz ring 1,781 1,874 Efaritay's aid 1,147 −727 59 94,400 −12.32
Topaz necklace 1,310 1,403 Necklace of faith 676 −727 59 94,400 −12.32
Topaz bracelet 2,533 2,626 Bracelet of slaughter 2,721 95 59 94,400 1.61
Topaz amulet 2,567 2,660 Burning amulet 3,848 1,188 59 94,400 20.14
  1. ↑ Cost calculated using a Staff of fire (provides unlimited Fire runes) and includes costs of Cosmic runes.
